body_html: This is a problem in Gloo. The error can be more descriptive though... I think this is caused by assuming sysfs is available at /sys. More specifically it tries to access PCI device information at /sys/bus/pci/devices/. Do you have that path mounted?

body: This is a problem in Gloo. The error can be more descriptive though... I think this is caused by assuming sysfs is available at /sys. More specifically it tries to access PCI device information at `/sys/bus/pci/devices/`. Do you have that path mounted?
